page.title: 11Hatfield Broad Oak Families
page.content: {Information compiled from an informal {survey of 25 families with children at {school on 9 July, 1985. } The size of families ranges from 2 to 7 persons living in the same house. Out of 56 adults 48 go to work, 17 in the village and the rest in other places to which most of them travel by car. The bus and train services (the latter from Bishop's Stortford) are used only occasionally and not on a daily basis. With the exception of a few children who are at private boarding schools the older children in the village go to eight or nine different secondary schools in Bishop's Stortford, Harlow, Newport and Stansted Mountfitchet, travelling by school coach or car. In the 25 families of our sample there are 43 cars, 4 motor cycles and 68 pedal cycles.
